latest news.eng_title: iPhone 16: What to Expect from the Next Generation of Apple Devices
latest news.summary: The upcoming 'iPhone 16' is expected to feature five major improvements, including a larger screen, design changes, significant camera upgrades, improved processor performance, and enhanced battery life and charging speeds. The 'iPhone 16 Pro' is expected to have a 6.3-inch screen, while the 'iPhone 16 Pro Max' will have a 6.9-inch screen. The 'iPhone 16' series will also feature a new design with a reorganized camera layout, similar to the 'iPhone 12'. The series will also include two new buttons: 'Action Button' and 'Camera Button', which will enhance user control. The camera system will be upgraded with a 48-megapixel wide-angle lens and a 'Periscope' lens for improved zoom capabilities. The 'iPhone 16 Pro Max' will also support 3D video recording. The series will be powered by the new A18 chip, built on a 3-nanometer process, which will provide significant performance and power efficiency improvements. The 'iPhone 16 Pro' will also support Wi-Fi 7, while the 'iPhone 16' will support Wi-Fi 6. The series will also feature improved battery life and charging speeds, including support for up to 40W fast charging and 20W MagSafe charging. The new design will also include replaceable battery options, in line with new European regulations.
latest news.title: هل "آيفون 16" هو الهاتف الذي كنا ننتظره؟

latest news.eng_title: Realme Sets New World Record for Smartphone Charging with 320W Supersonic Charge
latest news.summary: Realme has set a new world record for smartphone charging with its '320W Supersonic Charge' technology, which can fully charge a phone in under 5 minutes. The company has achieved this with a 320-Watt charging technology and an optimized battery design, which allows for more cells to be charged simultaneously. Realme's previous phone, the Realme GT3, had a charging capacity of up to 240W and could be fully charged in 10 minutes. In comparison, Xiaomi's 14 Ultra has a maximum charging capacity of 90W, while Samsung's Galaxy S24 Ultra has a maximum charging capacity of 45W. Apple's iPhone 15 has a maximum charging capacity of 20W. Realme's new technology is expected to be used in a future phone, but the exact model is not yet known.
latest news.title: So einen Handy-Akku haben Samsung und Xiaomi noch nicht geliefert: Dieser Hersteller knackt den Weltrekord

latest news.eng_title: Apple event likely on September 10: Here are 5 biggest rumours you need to know
latest news.summary: Apple is expected to launch the iPhone 16 series on September 10, according to tipsters. The official announcement has not been made yet, but previous trends suggest that the company will launch four models of the iPhone 16 series. Along with the new iPhone, several other hardware devices are also expected to be announced, although specific details are not yet available. Considering previous Apple event trends, it is certain that the company will launch the iPhone 16 series, which may include four models. As one tipster put it, 'the most awaited time of the year is almost here as Apple will soon launch the iPhone 16 series.'
latest news.title: Apple event likely on September 10: Here are 5 biggest rumours you need to know

latest news.eng_title: Best iPhone 16 Pro & 16 Pro Max Features Revealed
latest news.summary: The upcoming iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max are expected to feature several significant upgrades, including larger and more vibrant displays, increased battery capacity, enhanced processing power, advanced camera capabilities, and seamless connectivity. The devices will sport 6.3-inch and 6.86-inch screens, respectively, and will be powered by the A18 and A18 Pro chips, manufactured using TSMC's advanced 3nm process. The camera system will feature a 48MP wide camera and potentially a 48MP ultra-wide camera, with a dedicated capture button for quick access. The devices will also support the latest Wi-Fi 7 standard, offering faster and more reliable internet connectivity. Additionally, the iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max will come equipped with 8GB of RAM and storage options up to 2TB, and will feature a redesigned camera layout, ultra-thin bezels, and a polished titanium finish. Apple has also focused on improving the charging capabilities of the devices, with MagSafe charging supporting speeds of up to 20W and wired charging supporting speeds of up to 40-45W.
latest news.title: Best iPhone 16 Pro & 16 Pro Max Features Revealed

latest news.eng_title: Apple's New iPhone 16 Is Only Weeks Away: Everything We Expect to See
latest news.summary: Apple is expected to release the iPhone 16 in September, with the new model featuring Apple Intelligence, a central AI-powered feature. The iPhone 16 series will also include revamped hardware, such as new power-efficient displays, larger screens, and better zoom lenses. According to rumors, the iPhone 16 and 16 Pro will also feature an action button and upgraded cameras. Apple's annual iPhone event is typically held in September, with this year's event expected to take place on Tuesday, September 10. The iPhone 16 will be competing with rival phones from Samsung and Google, which have already incorporated AI and generative AI features. As Apple's Tim Cook said, 'We're excited to bring our latest innovations to the market, and we think our customers will love the new features and capabilities of the iPhone 16.'
latest news.title: Apple's New iPhone 16 Is Only Weeks Away: Everything We Expect to See

latest news.eng_title: When Can We Expect the Next iPhone SE?
latest news.summary: It has been over four years since the last iPhone SE was released, and with the current model looking outdated, it's time for an update. However, rumors about the upcoming iPhone SE 4 are scarce. As we approach September and a potential Apple event, information about the iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Pro has accelerated, but there's little to no information about a new SE. According to limited rumors, the next-generation iPhone SE will have a design similar to the iPhone 14, with a potential disappearance of the home button and the addition of a Dynamic Island to the screen. It's also expected to have a decent chip, although its power is unknown. Apple may be waiting until 2025 to release a new iPhone SE, when their work on Apple Intelligence centered around AI has matured and can be incorporated into other devices. Alternatively, Apple could release an affordable iPhone that doesn't include AI features, catering to those who don't care about AI. This is all speculation, but there's still hope for an affordable iPhone for everyone.
latest news.title: ¿Dónde está la próxima generación del iPhone SE?

latest news.eng_title: Apple to Assemble iPhone 16 Pro Model in India
latest news.summary: Apple is planning to launch its new iPhone 16 series in September, and according to reports, the company will assemble the Pro model in India. The new series will be powered by the A18 Pro chip and will feature a powerful neural engine, which will improve AI and machine learning tasks. The Pro model is expected to have a longer battery life, with a 3,577mAh battery, compared to the 3,274mAh battery in the iPhone 15 Pro. The device will also support 40W wired charging and 20W MagSafe charging. Apple has been considering assembling the iPhone Pro model in India for some time now, and it seems that the company has finally made the decision to do so.
latest news.title: अब भारत में बनेगा IPhone 16 का Pro Model जुड़ेंगे तमाम नए AI फीचर्स

latest news.eng_title: iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro Max Launch: What To Expect At Apple Event In September
latest news.summary: Apple is expected to launch the iPhone 16 series, including the iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro, and iPhone 16 Pro Max, on September 10. According to reports, the phones will go on sale on September 20. The standard iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus are expected to have similar prices to last year's models, while the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max may see a price increase of up to Rs 10,000. The iPhone 16 Pro models will feature a new 'Capture Button' and a size increase, with the iPhone 16 Pro featuring a 6.3-inch display and the iPhone 16 Pro Max sporting a 6.9-inch display. The standard iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus will retain the same sizes as their predecessors, but with minor design tweaks. The iPhone 16 Pro models will include the Tetraprism 5x optical zoom lens and support faster 40W wired charging and 20W MagSafe charging.
latest news.title: iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro Max Launch: What To Expect At Apple Event In September

latest news.eng_title: New iPhone 16 Release Date and Models: What We Know So Far
latest news.summary: There has been recent information about the possible release of the new iPhone 16. According to a post on the social media platform X, the device may be released on September 10, 2024. However, Forbes has stated that this is a rumor, but they do suggest that the release could happen in a few weeks. Experts in technology believe that the iPhone 16 will have multiple models, including the standard, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro, and iPhone 16 Pro Max. The standard model may have a 6.1-inch OLED screen and dual camera. Mark Gurman from Bloomberg stated that Apple event invites never leak in advance, and that the original poster published the information with 'zero diligence and a claim of authority.' According to a source, the new Apple event where the iPhone 16 will be presented, will be held on September 10, 2024. 'Apple event invites never leak in advance,' Gurman said, 'That would essentially be impossible.'
latest news.title: ¿Cuándo sale el nuevo iPhone 16? Esto es lo que se sabe

news knowledge.eng_title: iPhone 16 Pro: New Battery and Charging Features Confirmed
news knowledge.summary: Apple is expected to unveil the iPhone 16 series in September, with several new features, including a larger battery capacity and faster charging. According to leaker Instant Digital, the iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max will have a battery capacity of 3,577 mAh and 4,676 mAh, respectively, with an increase of 9.25% and 5.74% compared to the previous generation. The iPhone 16 Pro will also feature a slightly larger display, with a more elongated aspect ratio. Additionally, Apple is expected to increase the charging speed to 40W, with a 20W MagSafe wireless charging option. However, it is unclear whether these features will be exclusive to the Pro models or available across the entire iPhone 16 lineup. As Instant Digital notes, 'the jump in battery capacity will be the most significant for the iPhone 16 Pro, with a 9.25% increase.'
news knowledge.title: IPhone 16 Pro: nuove conferme su batteria e ricarica "veloce"

news knowledge.eng_title: iPhone 16 Pro: Apple's New Features and Improvements
news knowledge.summary: Apple is expected to unveil the iPhone 16 series in September, with several new features, including a larger battery and faster charging. According to Instant Digital, a Chinese leaker, the iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max will have a battery capacity of 3,577 mAh and 4,676 mAh, respectively, a +9.25% and +5.74% increase from the previous generation. The new iPhone 16 Pro will also have a slightly larger display, with a more elongated aspect ratio. Apple is also expected to increase the charging speed to 40W, up from 27W, and the MagSafe wireless charging to 20W, up from 15W. However, it is unclear if these features will be exclusive to the Pro models or available across the entire iPhone 16 series. As reported by Instant Digital, 'the new iPhone 16 Pro will have a battery that is significantly larger than its predecessor, with a capacity of 3,577 mAh, a +9.25% increase.'
news knowledge.title: iPhone 16 Pro: batteria più grande e ricarica rapida tra le novità

news knowledge.eng_title: Iphone 16 Pro set for launch, AI enhancements pushed to 2025
news knowledge.summary: Apple Loop: The latest updates on the iPhone 16 Pro, including faster charging capabilities and expected launch dates. Apple faces delays in AI advancements and celebrates a record number of Emmy nominations. The iPhone 16 Pro models will support 40W wired charging speeds, reducing charging time. The launch dates are predicted to be on September 10, with pre-orders starting shortly after. Apple's AI advancements, branded as Apple Intelligence, are delayed until 2025. The Files app in iPadOS 18 has been enhanced to offer more intelligent downloads and offline access. Security improvements have been made, with Cellebrite reporting that its current tools cannot crack iPhones running iOS 17.4 and later. Apple TV+ has secured a record 72 Emmy nominations, reflecting the platform's growing success in the streaming industry.
news knowledge.title: Iphone 16 Pro set for launch, AI enhancements pushed to 2025

news knowledge.summary: According to Chinese sources, Apple's upcoming iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max models will feature fast charging with a power output of 40 watts. The devices will also support wireless charging at 20 watts. The iPhone 16 and 16 Plus models are expected to retain their current charging speed. The current top-of-the-line iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max models can charge at a maximum of 27 watts using a USB-C adapter, while the maximum wireless charging speed of MagSafe is 15 watts. Insiders say that the support for fast charging will help solve the problem of increased charging time caused by the increased battery capacity. The iPhone 16 series is expected to have an increased battery capacity. The article states that the rumors about new Apple devices are becoming more frequent due to the upcoming release of the devices. The announcement of the iPhone 16 series is expected in mid-September.

news knowledge.eng_title: iPhone 16 Pro to Feature Faster Charging Capabilities
news knowledge.summary: The iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max are expected to have faster charging capabilities, with 40W charging via cable and 20W charging via MagSafe. This is an improvement from the iPhone 15 Pro, which has 27W charging via cable and 15W charging via MagSafe. The faster charging is likely due to the increased battery size and the need to balance the increased battery life with charging time. Apple is expected to announce the iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Pro in September, along with other products such as the Apple Watch Series 10.

news knowledge.eng_title: Apple Stock: Faster Charging Boosts Interest
news knowledge.summary: Apple is set to increase the charging speeds for the upcoming iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max models. The new devices will feature a 20W MagSafe wireless charging and a 40W cable fast charging function. This improvement aims to address the issue of longer charging times with higher battery capacities. This update could boost investor interest in Apple, as faster charging speeds are a highly sought-after feature that improves the user experience. The new charging functions of the iPhone 16 series represent a significant step forward compared to the current iPhone 15 models, which only support 27W cable charging.
news knowledge.title: Apple Aktie: Schnelleres Laden steigert Interesse

The Pro versions may support 20W wireless and 40W cable charging, which is a significant upgrade from the current 27W peak charging speeds. This change is aimed at balancing the issue of increasing charging time caused by the larger battery capacity. The iPhone 16 series is also rumored to have bigger batteries than its predecessors, with the Pro Max model potentially having a 4,676mAh battery. The series is expected to launch in September 2024 with AI features out of the box.

news knowledge.eng_title: iPhone 16 Pro to get 40W wired charging and 20W MagSafe wireless charging
news knowledge.summary: Rumors suggest that the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max will feature improved charging rates, including 40W wired charging and 20W MagSafe wireless charging. This is an increase from the current 27W wired and 15W wireless charging capabilities of the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max. The higher peak rates may help compensate for increased battery capacity in the new models, which are expected to be unveiled in September. However, it remains to be seen how this will affect actual charging times. Apple is still behind Chinese companies in terms of charging speeds, but is making progress.
